name: Anima Beyond Fantasy
description: This script roll basically 1d100 with the Anima's System (open roll if dice > 90, then 91... And fumble if dice < 3). Many options allow nearly all possibility of Anima's System and Roll20 (complex, inhuman, zen, initiative, whispers...). Particularly adapted to ABF Sheet. Based on aRotondi openRoll Script https://gist.github.com/aRotondi1990/6795346
